title: Dark.Funeral-Teach.Children.to.Worship.Satan[2000][MP3][320Kbps]
description:
Dark Funeral - Teach Children to Worship Satan [2000]
=====================================================

Released: March 27th, 2000
Genre:    Black metal
Length:   27:09
Label:    No Fashion Records
Producer: Tommy Tagtgren & Dark Funeral

Track listing:
==============

   1. An Apprentice of Satan - (6:05)
   2. The Trial (King Diamond) - (5:26)
   3. Dead Skin Mask (Slayer) - (4:46)
   4. Remember the Fallen (Sodom) - (4:15)
   5. Pagan Fears (Mayhem) - (6:31)


Teach Children to Worship Satan is a cover album by Dark Funeral.
Tracks two through five were recorded for various tribute albums. Track one was recorded a preview for their next studio album. An Apprentice of Satan was then rerecorded for Diabolis Interium.
